author: dusty
title: Are you on medicare? Better see this....
text: Are you on medicare? Better see this.... no link needed for this one lawmakers plan to cut what medacare part A covers by half. that would force those on medacare part A only to change the plann to medacare part A and B in order to cover er cost that was or is coverd by part A. where part B there is a fee to pay. of 300 to 400 a month for the insurance. if this did not happen yet part A covers all for part A. Last edited by imaginethat; October 8th, 2015 at 12:51 PM .
